description:
OddsAndEvens.andTheWinnerIs() (shared/front_running/odds_and_evens/odds_and_evens_4round.sol#30-42) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- players[0].addr.transfer(1800000000000000000) (shared/front_running/odds_and_evens/odds_and_evens_4round.sol#34)
	- players[1].addr.transfer(1800000000000000000) (shared/front_running/odds_and_evens/odds_and_evens_4round.sol#37)
